Articles.Content: I know i may sound like a PITA but anyone else notice that thursdays and now fridays daily kerbal is missing?
Yeah its strange, I'm not really sure whats happening hopefully nothing bad.

Yeah its strange, I'm not really sure whats happening hopefully nothing bad.

WAIT!!!! This happened during .22 launch! They delayed the weekly... and then posted a release date!!!!!
From what I've seen, there's really no set schedule to exactly when the Daily Kerbal gets posted during the day. Rest assured, it should be out soon enough
The guys who usually do the Daily are currently very busy at GDC, so I suspect that's part of the problem
